_config:Query._config:SQL: SELECT catgrpdesc.name , catgrpdesc.catgroup_id AS CATGROUP_ID, 1 AS SEQENCE FROM catgrpdesc WHERE catgroup_id IN (SELECT catgroup_id FROM CATTOGRP WHERE catalog_id IN (SELECT catalog_id FROM catalog WHERE identifier='HWCSalesCatalog' ) ) AND language_id =-1 UNION ALL SELECT catgrpdesc.name, catgrpdesc.catgroup_id AS CATGROUP_ID, 2 AS SEQENCE FROM catgrpdesc WHERE catgroup_id IN (SELECT catgroup_id_child FROM catgrprel WHERE catgroup_id_parent IN (SELECT catgroup_id FROM CATTOGRP WHERE catalog_id IN (SELECT catalog_id FROM catalog WHERE identifier='HWCSalesCatalog' ) ) ) AND language_id =-1 UNION ALL SELECT catgrpdesc.name, catgrpdesc.catgroup_id AS CATGROUP_ID, 3 AS SEQENCE FROM catgrpdesc WHERE catgroup_id IN (SELECT catgroup_id_child FROM catgrprel WHERE catgroup_id_parent IN (SELECT catgroup_id_child FROM catgrprel WHERE catgroup_id_parent IN (SELECT catgroup_id FROM CATTOGRP WHERE catalog_id IN (SELECT catalog_id FROM catalog WHERE identifier='HWCSalesCatalog' ) ) ) ) AND language_id =-1 ORDER BY SEQENCE ASC

SELECT a.catgroup_id, a.identifier AS GroupIdentifier, DECODE( (SELECT catgroup_id_parent FROM catgrprel WHERE catgroup_id_child = a.catgroup_id AND ROWNUM = 1 ),NULL,'true','false') AS topGROUP , NVL( (SELECT identifier FROM catgroup WHERE catgroup_id IN (SELECT catgroup_id_parent FROM catgrprel WHERE catgroup_id_child = a.catgroup_id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ),'') AS ParentGroupIdentifier, (SELECT sequence FROM catgrprel WHERE catgroup_id_child = a.catgroup_id AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS sequence, b.name, SUBSTR(b.shortdescription,0,254) shortdescription, b.longdescription, b.thumbnail, b.fullimage, (SELECT urlkeyword FROM seourl x, seourlkeyword y WHERE x.tokenname='CategoryToken' AND x.tokenvalue =a.catgroup_id AND x.seourl_id = y.seourl_id AND ROWNUM =1 ) AS keyword, a.markfordelete, a.field1, b.published FROM catgroup a, catgrpdesc b WHERE a.catgroup_id=b.catgroup_id AND a.catgroup_id = ? AND B.LANGUAGE_ID = -1 ORDER BY a.identifier
